first_title: Collaborate With People Around The World

post.second_title: Sign Up To Create A Gathering

content.0: Focallocal is an open, welcoming community of thousands of positive people around the world.
content.1: Since 2012 we have been coming together and targeting the root causes of any, and all societal issues.
content.2: Sharing ideas, and using fun activities to empower people to build a friendlier, happier more connected future for everyone.
content.3: Join us and turn Public Happiness into a daily habit to explore your power to change the world, and the happiness it'll bring into your life

items.smiley: make the world happier every day
items.friends: make + meet positive friends all over the world
items.share: share + learn skills for your career or building change
